scripts.dev: bun run dev:web & bun run dev:admin & bun run dev:api & bun run dev:worker
scripts.build: bun run --filter shared build && bun run --filter web build && bun run --filter api build && bun run --filter worker build
scripts.build:api: cd apps/api && bun run build && bun run build
scripts.build:worker: cd apps/worker && bun run build && npx playwright install chromium --with-deps || (echo 'Warning: --with-deps failed, trying without...' && npx playwright install chromium)
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
